nodes.text: Zoochberry pie was a type of pie made with zoochberries, edible by Humans and Wookiees. In 5 ABY, the Human Han Solo moved into a sky house on the planet Bespin with his Wookiee companion Chewbacca. The Wookiee learned to cook zoochberry pies there and served one to their Human friend Luke Skywalker for dessert when he visited the sky house. Skywalker complemented Chewbacca's pie as the best he had ever eaten.

Later that year, Solo traveled to Hologram Fun World to marry Leia Organa, where they met their friend Lando Calrissian. After the couple realized that neither of them had their birth certificates, Calrissian remarked that, as he was Baron Administrator of the world, a solution would be "simple as zoochberry pie."
Zoochberry pie first appeared in the 1992 junior novel The Lost City of the Jedi, written by Paul and Hollace Davids.
